item.title: Forget Toy Story 5, This Is The Action Figures Movie That Desperately Needs A Sequel
item.description: Toy Story may have been the most famous toy-centric movie to come out of the 1990s, but another movie about living toys is long overdue for a sequel.

item.title: Aaron Taylor-Johnson Reflects On Playing Quicksilver In The MCU, Sharing Role With Evan Peters
item.description: Avengers: Age of Ultron star looks back on playing Quicksilver, starring opposite Elizabeth Olsen, and sharing his speedster role with Evan Peters.

item.title: Lindsay Lohanâ€™s 3 Netflix Comeback Movies Ranked, Worst To Best
item.description: Lindsay Lohan made three rom-coms with Netflix that helped relaunch her as a movie star, but not all of them were hits, and only one is the best.
